entry.title: BLUE SWIM SHORTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Saint Potential
Type:
Price: 50.00

SPRING IS HERE, U KNOW WHAT THAT MEANS. INTRODUCING SAINT POTENTIAL SWIMMING SHORTS ;)

SIZE DOWN FOR TRUE FIT! ALL SWIMMING SHORTS FIT BIGGER THAN OUR MESH SHORTS!!!! 

 

- High Quality Polyester Fabric

- Silky smooth

- No inner net

- 5" to 6" inseam

- Sublimation graphic

- Custom Woven Tag

- All sales final, no returns or exchanges

- ALL SHORTS ARE IN-HAND AND WILL BE SHIPPED WITHIN 1-4 BUSINESS DAYS

  

 

Size guide

  XS S M L XL
Waist (inches) 30 ⅞ 32 ½ 34 ⅛ 36 ¼ 38⅜
Hips (inches) 37 38 ⅝ 40 ⅛ 43 ¼ 46 ½
